## DeadmanCheck type

**Signature:**

```typescript
type DeadmanCheck = CheckBase & {
    type: 'deadman';
    timeSince?: string;
    staleTime?: string;
    reportZero?: boolean;
    level?: CheckStatusLevel;
    every?: string;
    offset?: string;
    tags?: Array<{
        key?: string;
        value?: string;
    }>;
    statusMessageTemplate?: string;
};
```
